1210906308.name: Moments of Triumph 2022
1210906308.description: Complete 28 of 30 of these Feats of Strength before 2/28/2023 to claim unique rewards.

2658563592.name: Reward: Emblem
2658563592.description: Complete Triumphs to earn a bungie.net token that unlocks the 2022 Moments of Triumph emblem for redemption on bungie.net.

3186000759.name: Reward: Emblem
3186000759.description: Complete Triumphs to earn a special emblem.

3084788911.name: Reward: Ghost Shell
3084788911.description: Complete Triumphs to earn the 2022 Moments of Triumph Ghost Shell.

1329166918.name: T-Shirt Unlocked at Bungie Store
1329166918.description:
Complete Triumphs to unlock the 2022 T-shirt for purchase in the Bungie Store.

Visit bungiestore.com/rewards

2773485199.name: Raid Runner, Dungeon Diver
2773485199.description:
Complete the following raid and dungeon objectives to earn a special Sparrow and emblem. 

Additionally, completing this Triumph unlocks the Bungie rewards Moments of Triumph patch.

2724606020.description:
Defeat targets in Gambit with any of the following ritual weapons: Reckless Endangerment, Chain of Command, Cry Mutiny, or Veles-X.

Bonus progress for defeating opposing Guardians.

1704885249.description: Defeat Guardians in Crucible with any of the following ritual weapons: Reckless Endangerment, Chain of Command, Cry Mutiny, or Veles-X.

Weapon levels can be gained across several weapons.

2028879190.name: Don't Call It A Staff

4233323731.description: Earn the Exotic Rocket Launcher Gjallarhorn.

361765966.name: Deadeye
361765966.description: Collect all weapon types and complete select Gilding Triumphs.

427766278.name: Weapon Flair
427766278.description: Get precision final blows and rapidly defeat combatants at point-blank range while using any weapon in Gambit.

2425294908.name: Weapon Focus
2425294908.description: In Nightfall strikes, accumulate weapon final blows and precision weapon final blows without dying.

2791463006.name: Three Birds, Three Stones
2791463006.description: In Crucible, defeat opponents with a Kinetic weapon, an Energy weapon, and a Power weapon.

530721107.name: Ritual of the Season
530721107.description: In playlist activities, rapidly defeat opponents with weapons matching the archetype of the current Seasonal weapon. Defeating Guardians grants more progress.

901961924.name: Season's Greetings
901961924.description: Defeat targets with the Seasonal weapon from this Season. Defeating Guardians grants more progress.

993949190.name: Weapon Archivist
993949190.description: Unlock weapon entries in your collection by acquiring weapons for the first time.

1965921084.name: Dark Age Arsenal
1965921084.description: Win a Gambit match with a Gambit weapon equipped in every slot.

2790931445.name: Munitions Variety Pack
2790931445.description: Defeat combatants with Kinetic, Energy, and Power weapons.

2031838581.name: Sweet Spotter
2031838581.description: Defeat combatants with precision weapon damage by targeting their weak points.

1132038861.name: Linear Fusion Rifle Aptitude
1132038861.description: Defeat combatants with Linear Fusion Rifles.

3679329876.name: Heavy Machine Gun Aptitude
3679329876.description: Defeat combatants with Heavy Machine Guns.

3937029060.name: Auto Rifle Mastery
3937029060.description: With any Auto Rifle, defeat Guardians in the Crucible and earn the medal "Assault Specialist."

792778666.name: Pulse Rifle Mastery
792778666.description: With any Pulse Rifle, defeat Guardians in the Crucible.

2604627899.name: Scout Rifle Mastery
2604627899.description: With any Scout Rifle, defeat Guardians in the Crucible and earn the medal "Field Scout."

3525486243.name: Hand Cannon Mastery
3525486243.description: With any Hand Cannon, defeat Guardians in the Crucible and land precision final blows. Earn the medal "Hawkeye."

4235993550.name: Bow Mastery
4235993550.description: With any Bow, land final blows, precision final blows, and long-range final blows against Guardians in the Crucible. Earn the medal "My Bowfriend's Back."

3100783191.name: Sidearm Mastery
3100783191.description: With any Sidearm, defeat Guardians in the Crucible and earn the medal "One for Each of You."

4272358785.name: Submachine Gun Mastery
4272358785.description: With any Submachine Gun, defeat Guardians in the Crucible and earn the medal "Sub Machinist."

349070628.name: Shotgun Mastery
349070628.description: With any Shotgun, defeat Guardians in the Crucible and earn the medal "Close Encounters."

4107780895.name: Sniper Rifle Mastery
4107780895.description: With any Sniper Rifle, defeat Guardians in the Crucible and land precision final blows. Earn the medal "Mission Control."

3387118902.name: Fusion Rifle Mastery
3387118902.description: With any Fusion Rifle, defeat Guardians in the Crucible. With any Linear Fusion Rifle, land precision final blows. Earn the medal "Cold Fusion."

832436622.name: Trace Rifle Mastery
832436622.description: Defeat Guardians in the Crucible with final blows from Trace Rifles.

3364492516.name: Grenade Launcher Mastery
3364492516.description: With any Grenade Launcher, defeat Guardians in the Crucible and land direct hit final blows. Earn the medal "Direct Hit!"

361765966.title: Deadeye

Gilded Title Triumph

Tracks completions in Gambit. Wins provide bonus progress.

2757330809.description: Matches won where you banked the most Motes across both teams, didn't die, or dealt the most damage to all combatant types.

3665545491.name: Get Out

180301225.description: Number of Guardians you defeated as an Invader in Gambit.

2206124374.name: High-Value Hawk
2206124374.description: Defeat high-value targets (such as wanted enemies) from all enemy species.

572729504.name: Light Versus Light
572729504.description: Defeat an opponent in Gambit while their Super is active.

903856480.name: Gambit for All Seasons

1965921084.name: Dark Age Arsenal
1965921084.description: Win a Gambit match with a Gambit weapon equipped in every slot.

2257346269.name: Thrillmonger

1277450448.name: Short Circuit
1277450448.description: Confront Taniks while allowing only one player from your fireteam to deposit nuclear cores.

1221037312.description: Complete the "Garden of Salvation" raid with a team made entirely of clanmates.
